about.title: About Me
about.about1: Hi there! I'm Tymo Verhaegen, an application developer and design enthusiast based in Belgium.
about.about2: With a background in application development and an interest in design, I bring a unique perspective to my projects. Whether it's creating intuitive user interfaces or implementing the best possible user experience, I'm always up for a challenge.
about.about3: When I'm not coding, you can find me producing music, playing games, experimenting in the kitchen, or planning my next travel adventure.
